This option is not available in your account.
The current entry has been already changed. You must refresh your data and try again.
You must restart the application to apply new language.
Hit the start button to begin your cardio session. Press stop when you\'re done and the total session time will be recorded. You can also set this time manually.
Program has detected some sets with probably incorrect values. Press OK to save them or Cancel to skip.\n\nIncorrect sets:
By clicking Create button you accept Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
You must fill all required data
Cannot finish the current operation. Please try later.
Email with new password has been sent.
Username or email is already used
Enter your username or email address and press Ok button. New password will be sent on your email.
No status in this category. To achieve %1$s status, %2$d items are required.
%1$s: Current status achieved after %2$d items in this category. %3$s
when your friend has added entry to the calendar
when person you follow has added entry to the calendar
when someone has commented your day
when someone has voted on your workout plan, exercise etc
about all social events, like friendship invitations, favorite profile deleted etc

Choose, if you want other users to comment on your entries in the calendar. This is the default setting for new entries only. Of course, you can change the possibility of commenting on for each day in the calendar separately.
When automatic update is enabled you are not able to modify measurements here. In this mode you enter all measurements in the calendar.
Cannot use selected image. Choose another one
Do you want to leave without saving changes?
There are no email clients installed.

We’re sorry, an application error has occurred. If you would like to help us improve BodyArchitect, then you can send us email with error information. We will try to fix this problem as soon as possible.\n\nThanks for your help!
Using higher account types will cost you appropriate number of points. In account’s description you will find info about required number of points for every day of using this account.
Changing account type to lower will cost you the following amounts of points: %d. Are you sure you want to continue?
Do you want to change an account type?
You don\'t have enough points to upgrade your account. Buy some and try again.

Totally free account, which gives you an access to the most of the program\'s features. You don\'t need anything more to start your professional workout log. Join the best bodybuilders all over the world!

Do you want to be the best in your training? Do you want your training be more effective? Do you know that workout log is the one of the best tools for design a perfect body? Premium account gives you access to all features of BodyArchitect (except tools designed especially for fitness instructors). You will find a lots of additional features and smaller improvements, which are created to enhanced your user\'s experience of the application and make your trainings more effective.

If you are a fitness instructor and have your training classes or personal trainings, then Instructor account is created just for you. Create your own customers database and activities schedule. Additionally every customer can have professional workout log. From now you have access to all trainings of your customer at anytime, anyplace. You may also generate many useful reports (charts) from your customers\' logs.

Very hard training for abs. There are no too many people who finished it but who cares? If you want to have a nice „6 pack”, you must have a strong motivation. BodyArchitect will help you to finish this training but it will not do it for you. Join to the elite group of people who did it!

Do you always want to know how other bodybuilders workout? Do you think that this knowledge would help you with your training? If the answer is yes, then use BodyArchitect to have access to workout log of other users. Additionally you can comment their entries or give them some tips if needed!
Tell your thought in the blog
Share your thoughts with others about your each workout. Explain to newbies how to train properly. BodyArchitect gives you a possibility to have an unlimited number of entries in your blog.

Large exercise database includes almost all major exercises with description. It’s complete solution for the novice bodybuilder. You need more? Consider a Premium or Instructor account, which allows you to create your own exercises and modify existing one using feature called „Equipment”.

BodyArchitect automatically tracks your personal records for each exercise. To make this works, you need to enter full set information (with repetitions and weight) and set cannot be marked as Muscle failure. If you have more than 30 strength training entries in your calendar, then your records will be public and you will be able to compare it with other users.

How do you know if your workout is good and gives you best results? One of the best way to know this is to measure your body (eg measuring biceps, chest circumference, etc). If you do this regularly (eg every month) and put them in your workout log, you will be able to analyze how effective your training is. Remember – the numbers do not lie!

There are millions of people like you around the world, for whom fitness is a passion. They spend many hours on the gym and the rest time they think about it. Meet other bodybuilders, make connections and share experiences.

This module helps you to track results of all lifters in powerlifting competitions. Now you can organize a powerlifting competition in your gym/school. Add all lifters into BodyArchitect, record all results and application will calculate final results
Customers database with all important information

You can have unlimited number of customers (standard or virtual). What is a virtual client? It represents a group of people like women, student, policeman, etc. In addition, you can group your customers, making it easier to manage them.

Do you have a lot of activities in the week? Do you write reservations for your customers in a piece of paper? It’s time to change this. BodyArchitect allows you to create a schedule including customer reservations, track their presence, as well as payments.

With Basic account you could add entries to your workout log in the past and to the present day. If you need to add entries in the future (eg, planned workouts), you need Premium or Instructor account for this.
With Premium account you can specify additional info about your strength training like rest pause and super slow in sets.
Copy all exercises to new training

Basic account gives you access to a huge database of exercises. But we know that advanced bodybuilders want to use their own exercises. Premium or Instructor account allows you to create any number of exercises. You can also add other users’ exercises to favorites and use them in your calendar.
With this option, you can create your own supplements routine and use it in your calendar (as supplements cycle). Additionally you will be able to publish your routines to share them with others.

You will be able to create your own training plans and share them with other bodybuilders. In addition, in Premium or Instructor account you can add other users’ plans to your favorite list and use them as your plans.

You are in the gym and you want to do Bench Press, but the bench is occupied by someone else. So you decide to do this exercise on a machine. The problem with machines is that often you can put more weights than on barbell. In this case if you write this in your log (Bench Press with more weight), then you will see in your reports that you have a nice progress (increased weight for this exercise). But this is not true, because you did this in different way, by using different equipment. In Premium or Instructor account you can mark such exercise as done with different equipment so in reports you can show only data from „standard” Bench Press.
Update your account and see how much improvement is waiting for you.

Premium account allows you to specify a gym (places) of your strength training. This is cool feature because in many cases in different gyms there are machines with different weight (the same exercise you do with different weight in each gym). In this case your reports would show you incorrect data. By using My Places you can generate report from workouts done in specific gym only.
BodyArchitect without advertisements has more space for showing your workout data
You can print any training plan or supplement routine and take it to the gym.
Calendar and measurements can be private

If you don\'t want anyone to have access to your workout log or measurements, please consider upgrade your account to Premium or Instructor. They allow you to restrict access to your log. You can make it private or share with your friends only. You decide.

If you happen to forget about your training, taking supplements, or a friend\'s birthday, let BodyArchitect remember all of these situations and remind you about them in the most appropriate time for you.

BodyArchitect can create charts and reports using data from your workout log. Sometimes it is very difficult to analyze raw data from your calendar and get to know if you are making progress. If you generate a chart, then you will see whether the line „goes” up or down. And everything will become clear.

If you need to know rest time between sets, in Premium account you will find a timer to track such data. Simply start the timer before every set, and stop it when you finish. Simple as that but your journal will be even more valuable.

BodyArchitect has a unique feature of creating supplements cycles. Basically, you can choose a supplements routine for your next cycle, specify when you are going to start it and BodyArchitect will fill your calendar wih appropriate supplements entries including dosage and time when you should take it. In addition, application can shows you reminder.

You have bought some supplements but no idea how to use them? Or maybe you would like to know how other bodybuilders join supplements to achieve better results? BodyArchitect gives you access to supplements routine databases. Are you interested in creating your own routine? You need Premium or Instructor account for this.

Supplements are an integral part of many bodybuilders. Note your nutrition\'s usage in the workout log to be able to analyze what products have positive effects on your workout. BodyArchitect allows you to note all important data like dosage and time.

Your workout log is unlimited. Seriously! You can take measurements, workout and write a blog every day. Your notes can be very detailed. Do everything you need to increase your productivity and effectiveness.

Training plan is what every advanced bodybuilder should know and use. Now you have and access to a large database of training plans created by other users. If you want to create your own training plan and share it with others, you need Premium or Instructor account.

For every customer (standard or virtual) you can have a workout log and generate reports from it. You have access to all required data of your customers at any time. This is an ideal solution for personal trainers.
This feature is available in Instructor account only. Click the link bellow to see what great features you get after upgrading your account.
This feature is available in Premium or Instructor account only. Click the link bellow to see what great features you get after upgrading your account.
Do you want to accept this invitation?
Do you want to reject this invitation?
This invitation doesn\'t have any message
You have invited this user to your friends list.
You have been invited to this user\'s friends list.
There are no more loaded trainings.
Do you want to delete this entry?
Do you want to use server version or local in case of conflict?
My Places allow you to specify where (what gym) you have your workout. Later you can generate reports using trainings from specific gym only.
Hit the start button before you start of the current set. When you finish, stop the timer. Doing so before each sets to collect such information like rest between sets and how long every set last.

Specifies how you perform the exercise. If you do it in „standard” way, then choose default. Other options should be used only in exceptional situations. Only exercises with default equipment are included in the personal records.
GPS is not ready. Do you want to start?
Location service is disabled. Do you want to turn it on?
You must save this entry first
This entry doesn\'t have gps points (premium only)"
You haven\'t created any plans yet. To create a plan you can use BodyArchitect for PC.
You have no favorites plans yet
No plans found. Change search criteria and try again!
You must add this plan to favorites first
Do you want to insert selected day to strength training entry in today?
No sets defined for this exercise
You have no friends yet. Go to all tab to send invitations.
You have no favorite users. You can add users to the favorites list in all tab.
User hasn\'t written anything about himself yet
Do you want to send invitation?
Do you want to remove this user from your friends list?
Allows to change the applicaion language. Default means, that language will be taken from the system.
The number of months from which the calendar entries will be downloaded from the server. The program will automatically download entries from the current and previous month.
If enabled, BodyArchitect will detect if you haven’t moved for 5 seconds and will pause your workout. Once you move again the workout will be resumed.
Determines if whole exercise name or a shortcut is to be displayed in strength workout and when browsing workout plans.
copy sets data to new entry
Defines the way how strength training entry will be copied or how workout plan will be used in our calendar.
Turn on if you want the number of repeats and weight to be copied when you add the next set.

When selected, then for each superset (in strength training), if you add a new set to the one of joined exercises, then new sets will be added to rest of the exercises automatically. The same happen for delete set and for the timer (measured time will be added to all sets in the group)
Select, if you want to start timer automatically when you add a new strength training to your calendar. Available in Premium account only
Removes all photos, tips and tricks, exercises, supplements, workout plans and training days from the cache. After this application will retrieve those data when it is needed.
You must at lease login once to use offline mode.
Cannot use offline mode. Please try to login and clear the cache in Settings.

For more great features you can download BodyArchitect client for Windows. This is free application which has more features like: 
 
 Adding new exercises 
 Creating workout plans 
 Generating reports
 A6W workout module
 Supplements routines
 More features for instructors 
 
 Visit our website:
This feature is available in Premium or Instructor account only.

Application is now in offline mode and this means that you are not connected to the server. This mode has many limitations, but still you can add entries to your calendar. They will be saved in the local storage. Later when you will connect to the server, you must perform synchronization.
You have no customers yet. Use BodyArchitect for PC to create some
For more options like creating activities, your schedule or customer groups, please download BodyArchitect for PC
Turn this on if you don\'t want to your screen changing orientation in BodyArchitect. Which means that with this option application will use portrait mode only.
If you enjoy using BodyArchitect, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
We\'ve detected that BodyArchitect crashed last time. Do you want to recover your edited entry?
